message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You got lucky last round, but this time it's not so fair!
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'll give you a chance to make it right!
You're getting desperate, but I'm willing to meet you halfway... for now.
You're getting closer, but I'm not done negotiating yet!
I'm not backing down, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
